name: Atomblock
tag_list: digital-distribution, cloud-gaming, video-game, download, software-esd, webservices
overview:
ATOMBLOCK is the digital software and video games supplier delivering whitelabel e-stores and integrated entertainment solutions.

The Atomblock platform carries games and software from publishers including EA, Ubisoft, Symantec, Microsoft, Codemasters, Take-Two Interactive, along with titles from major casual gaming companies.

Cloud services

Atomblock Hosted Services (AHS) enables rights owners to securely distribute content to any shop, a-brand or portal. All content is contained in a single database, and only needs to be supplied once. AHS provides up-to-date management information on every stage in the distribution and sales process, allowing publishers full control, while at the same time providing real-time insight into customer activities and profiles.

The Hosted Services is intended to support publishers and bring portals to market and sell new and exciting types of content while minimizing setup, and overall operations costs for the publisher

An additional benefit is the Hosted Services ability to eliminate many of publishers fixed costs including storage, infrastructure, and IT management while also lowering perhaps the largest variable cost - bandwidth.

milestones.description: Atomblock was selected from more than ten thousand companies, from twenty-five European countries, to present to a panel of independent judges at the 7th annual European BizSpark Summit 2011 in Brussels on June 14th.
Digital games download platform DIJIDO opens up a whole new world for players in Turkey with AtomBlock
milestones.source_description: Digital games download platform DIJIDO opens up a whole new world for players in Turkey with AtomBlock
